languages.text: {n}Под глазами Капеллана залегли тени.{/n} "Если вы, Ваша Светлость, желаете молвить слово друзианской миссии, то можете рассчитывать на мои уши. После успения преподобного Иеронимуса я... вроде как старший миссионер на Футфоле. Имею право говорить за братьев и сестер своих".

traits.locale_text: {n}Капеллан выглядит изрядно утомленным и слегка ошарашенным. Завидев вас он устало улыбается.{/n} "А, это вы, Ваша Светлость. Прошу простить, после скоропостижной кончины отче Иеронимуса от дел отбоя нет. Я тут внезапно оказался ответственным за представительство друзианцев на Футфоле, так что, если у вас есть какое дело к нашей миссии, то это теперь ко мне".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Shadows have made their home under Chaplain's eyes.{/n} "If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has something to say to the Drusian mission, you can count on having my ear. Reverend Hieronymus's demise has left me... the senior missionary on Footfall, I suppose. I'm authorised to speak on behalf of my brothers and sisters."
languages.original_text: {n}Под глазами Капеллана залегли тени.{/n} "Если вы, Ваша Светлость, желаете молвить слово друзианской миссии, то можете рассчитывать на мои уши. После успения преподобного Иеронимуса я... вроде как старший миссионер на Футфоле. Имею право говорить за братьев и сестер своих".

traits.locale_text: {n}Shadows have made their home in the circles under the Chaplain's eyes.{/n} "If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has something to say to the Drusian mission, you can count on having my ear. Father Hieronymus's demise has left me as... the senior missionary on Footfall, I suppose. I'm authorised to speak on behalf of my brothers and sisters."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}牧师脸上挂着重重的黑眼袋。{/n}“如果你有什么话想告知德鲁苏斯布道所，我一定洗耳恭听。希罗尼穆斯牧师去世了……于是我成为了落脚港的高阶传教士。我有权代表我的兄弟姐妹们发言。”
languages.original_text: {n}Shadows have made their home under Chaplain's eyes.{/n} "If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has something to say to the Drusian mission, you can count on having my ear. Reverend Hieronymus's demise has left me... the senior missionary on Footfall, I suppose. I'm authorised to speak on behalf of my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师脸上挂着重重的黑眼袋。{/n}“如果你有什么话想告知德鲁苏斯布道所，我一定洗耳恭听。希罗尼穆斯神父去世了……于是我成为了落脚港的高阶传教士。我有权代表我的兄弟姐妹们发言。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}教戒官の目に暗い影が現れた。{/n}「陛下が聖ドルスス聖務に対して意見をしたいのなら、私は聞くつもりはありません。ヒエロニムス司祭の失踪のお陰で私は…フットフォールの上級宣教師になったんだと思います。私は兄弟や姉妹の変わりに語る権限を持っています」
languages.original_text: {n}Shadows have made their home under Chaplain's eyes.{/n} "If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has something to say to the Drusian mission, you can count on having my ear. Reverend Hieronymus's demise has left me... the senior missionary on Footfall, I suppose. I'm authorised to speak on behalf of my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官の目に暗い影が現れた。{/n}「陛下が聖ドルスス聖務に対して意見をしたいのなら、私は聞くつもりはありません。ヒエロニムス司祭の失踪のお陰で私は…フットフォールの上級宣教師になったんだと思います。私は兄弟や姉妹の変わりに語る権限を持っています」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Las sombras parecen haberse asentado en las ojeras del capellán.{/n} «Si mi{mf|lord|lady} tiene algo que decirle a la misión drusiana, aquí estoy. Supongo que el fallecimiento del reverendo Hieronymus me ha dejado a mí como misionero más veterano de Paso. Puedo hablar en nombre de mis hermanos y hermanas».
languages.original_text: {n}Shadows have made their home under Chaplain's eyes.{/n} "If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has something to say to the Drusian mission, you can count on having my ear. Reverend Hieronymus's demise has left me... the senior missionary on Footfall, I suppose. I'm authorised to speak on behalf of my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las sombras parecen haberse asentado en las ojeras del capellán.{/n} «Si mi{mf|lord|lady} tiene algo que decirle a la misión drusiana, aquí estoy. Supongo que el fallecimiento del padre Hieronymus me ha dejado a mí como misionero más veterano de Paso. Puedo hablar en nombre de mis hermanos y hermanas».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Schatten haben sich unter den Augen des Ordenspriesters eingenistet.{/n} "Wenn Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} etwas zur Mission des Heiligen Drusus zu sagen hat, leihe ich Euch gerne mein Ohr. Reverend Hieronymus' Tod hat mich zum ... nun, zum ranghöchsten Missionar auf Footfall gemacht, denke ich. Ich bin befugt, im Namen meiner Brüder und Schwestern zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: {n}Shadows have made their home under Chaplain's eyes.{/n} "If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has something to say to the Drusian mission, you can count on having my ear. Reverend Hieronymus's demise has left me... the senior missionary on Footfall, I suppose. I'm authorised to speak on behalf of my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schatten haben sich in den Ringen unter den Augen des Ordenspriesters eingenistet.{/n} "Wenn Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} etwas zur Mission des Heiligen Drusus zu sagen hat, leihe ich Euch gerne mein Ohr. Vater Hieronymus' Tod hat mich zum ... nun, zum ranghöchsten Missionar auf Footfall gemacht, denke ich. Ich bin befugt, im Namen meiner Brüder und Schwestern zu sprechen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Des cernes noirs semblent avoir élu définitivement domicile sous les yeux de Chapelain.{/n} « Si Votre Seigneurie a un message à transmettre à la mission drusienne, je suis tout ouïe. Puisque le révérend Hiéronymus n'est plus, je suis maintenant... le missionnaire supérieur de Castel, j'imagine. Je suis autorisé à parler au nom de mes frères et de mes sœurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Shadows have made their home under Chaplain's eyes.{/n} "If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has something to say to the Drusian mission, you can count on having my ear. Reverend Hieronymus's demise has left me... the senior missionary on Footfall, I suppose. I'm authorised to speak on behalf of my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Des cernes noirs semblent avoir élu définitivement domicile sous les yeux de Chapelain.{/n} « Si Votre Seigneurie a un message à transmettre à la mission drusienne, je suis tout ouïe. Puisque le père Hiéronymus n'est plus, je suis maintenant... le missionnaire supérieur de Castel, j'imagine. Je suis autorisé à parler au nom de mes frères et de mes sœurs. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Papaz'ın gözlerinin altı mosmor olmuş.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin Drusus Misyonu hakkında söyleyeceği bir şey varsa bunları dinlemekten onur duyarım. Muhterem Hieronymus'un vefatı beni... Binliman'daki baş misyoner yaptı sanıyorum. Kardeşlerim adına konuşmaya yetkim var."
languages.original_text: {n}Shadows have made their home under Chaplain's eyes.{/n} "If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship has something to say to the Drusian mission, you can count on having my ear. Reverend Hieronymus's demise has left me... the senior missionary on Footfall, I suppose. I'm authorised to speak on behalf of my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz'ın gözlerinin altı, kalıcı gölgelerle kaplanmış.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin Drusus Misyonu hakkında söyleyeceği bir şey varsa, bunları dinlemekten onur duyarım. Muhterem Hieronymus'un vefatı beni... Binliman'daki baş misyoner hâline getirdi sanıyorum. Kardeşlerim adına konuşmaya yetkim var."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
